DataElement.preferredName: Intensity-Modulated Spot-Scanning Proton Radiation Therapy Modality Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to the specific manner radiation therapy is delivered as a form of intensity-modulated radiation therapy that uses narrow pencil beams of protons to deliver radiation to a precise target while sparing surrounding tissues.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Intensity-Modulated Spot-Scanning Proton Radiation Therapy Modality
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the specific manner radiation therapy is delivered as a form of intensity-modulated radiation therapy that uses narrow pencil beams of protons to deliver radiation to a precise target while sparing surrounding tissues.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Intensity-Modulated Spot-Scanning Proton Therapy Radiation Therapy
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A form of intensity-modulated radiation therapy that uses narrow pencil beams of protons to deliver radiation to a precise target while sparing surrounding tissues.:Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Concepts.definition: A form of intensity-modulated radiation therapy that uses narrow pencil beams of protons to deliver radiation to a precise target while sparing surrounding tissues.

Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Spot Scan Intensity-Modulated Proton Therapy Modality Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The type or modality of spot scan intensity-modulated proton therapy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The same throughout in structure or composition; lacking variation or diversity in form.: The area of the body exposed to radiation during radiation therapy.: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.: The act of distributing or spreading or apportioning.
